name: recompute
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to calculate an answer or amount for a second, third, etc. time: You should recompute your taxes with whatever itemized deductions you have. The District Court instructed the Commission to re-compute his parole eligibility.
More examplesFewer examplesRecompute the net present value of the project based on the cost of capital you found.Not all lenders automatically re-compute the interest you owe if you reduce your principal faster than they expect.One of his tasks was to verify and recompute calculations made by other workers.We had come up with the wrong answer for our customer, and we were told to recompute the figures.
